example.name: transitive
example.text: No , we ought to be mad because he-3 has demeaned the office we gave him , [*-3] enlisting it in the service of private gain , just as we ought to be mad that public officials lie through their teeth , play disingenuous games about their activities or , to steal a phrase , make public service a private trough .
example.arg: [*-3] enlisting it in the service of private gain
